t: KL-CY-2023-002 - Kiowa Tribe Judiciary Act of 2023

c.t: 1 The Justices of the Supreme Court may select any person licensed to practice law in the United States, to serve as a "Judge pro-tem" of the Trial court, until the Justices of the Supreme Court determine a pro-tem appointment is no longer necessary; and,
2 The Chief Justice of the Supreme Court shall be responsible for managing or delegating the management of the dockets of all Courts in the Judicial Branch.
